<h3 id="X31805">X(31805) = CENTER OF THE ORTHOPOLAR CIRCLE OF THESE TRIANGLES: ABC-X3 REFLECTIONS AND ASCELLA</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a*((b+c)*a^5-(b^2-12*b*c+c^2)*a^4-2*(b^3+c^3)*a^3+2*(b^4+c^4-5*(b^2+c^2)*b*c)*a^2+(b^4-c^4)*(b-c)*a-(b^2-c^2)^2*(b+c)^2)  :  :

<br>
<b>X(31805) = X(1)+3*X(5918) = 3*X(3)-X(5777) = X(4)-3*X(11227) = 2*X(5)-3*X(10156) = X(10)-3*X(10178) = X(20)+3*X(10167) = X(72)-5*X(3522) = X(72)+3*X(11220) = 3*X(165)+X(12680) = 3*X(210)-7*X(16192) = 3*X(392)+X(9961) = 3*X(550)+X(24475) = 5*X(631)-3*X(10157) = X(942)-3*X(10167) = X(962)-3*X(5049) = 5*X(3522)+3*X(11220) = 3*X(5044)-2*X(5777) = 3*X(5806)-2*X(31822) = 3*X(9940)-X(31822) = 3*X(13369)-X(24475)</b>
<p>X(31805) lies on these lines:
{1,5918}, {3,9}, {4,11227}, {5,10156}, {10,10178}, {20,942}, {30,5806}, {72,3522}, {165,12680}, {210,16192}, {392,9961}, {405,10855}, {411,5122}, {443,10430}, {452,17612}, {511,31819}, {515,31787}, {516,5045}, {517,550}, {518,12512}, {519,31797}, {548,912}, {631,10157}, {916,13348}, {943,6909}, {944,12632}, {946,31657}, {962,3296}, {999,12565}, {1125,15726}, {1210,11575}, {1385,11496}, {1657,10202}, {1709,8273}, {1750,16408}, {1770,16193}, {2951,3333}, {3062,3646}, {3146,5439}, {3295,10860}, {3361,14100}, {3523,5927}, {3534,24474}, {3555,9778}, {3576,9856}, {3579,24467}, {3655,13600}, {3660,6284}, {3812,28164}, {3824,8727}, {3848,12571}, {3876,21734}, {3916,7411}, {3927,30304}, {4189,17616}, {4292,11018}, {4294,12915}, {4298,16201}, {4316,13750}, {4324,5570}, {5435,9844}, {5542,20790}, {5584,10085}, {5731,9957}, {5787,6916}, {6259,6865}, {6684,9947}, {6763,7964}, {6827,22792}, {6914,13624}, {6948,18481}, {7987,12688}, {8703,31837}, {9579,17603}, {9589,17609}, {9708,10864}, {9848,13462}, {10304,12528}, {10306,12631}, {10624,16215}, {10857,11108}, {10884,24929}, {11495,12516}, {12128,31393}, {12511,15733}, {13373,28146}, {13374,28150}, {13384,17634}, {13754,31816}, {16616,28172}, {17668,30478}</p>
<p>
X(31805) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {20, 942}, {550, 13369}, {944, 31798}, {4297, 9943}, {12675, 31730}, {18481, 31788}<br>
X(31805) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (5044, 3), (5806, 9940), (9947, 6684)<br>
X(31805) = {X(i), X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (3, 84, 31445), (3, 7330, 31658), (5732, 9841, 3)<br>
</p>
